item.title: Shannon add a quote by Wilma Mankiller
item.description: "One of the things my parents taught me, and I'll always be grateful as a gift, is to not ever let anybody else define me; that for me to define myself . . . and I think that helped me a lot in assuming a leadership position." -- Wilma Mankiller

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "We need to remember across generations that there is as much to learn as there is to teach. " -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Matsuo Basho
item.description: "Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise; seek what they sought." -- Matsuo Basho

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shannon add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Little by little, one travels far" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "I am an expression of the divine, just like a peach is, just like a fish is. I have a right to be this way...I can't apologize for that, nor can I change it, nor do I want to... We will never have to be other than who we are in order to be successful...We realize that we are as ourselves unlimited and our experiences valid. It is for the rest of the world to recognize this, if they choose." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "We must live together as brothers or perish together as fools." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Sitting Bull
item.description: "Let us put our minds together and see what life we can make for our children." -- Sitting Bull

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Yukio Mishima
item.description: "What transforms this world is â€” knowledge. Do you see what I mean? Nothing else can change anything in this world. Knowledge alone is capable of transforming the world, while at the same time leaving it exactly as it is. When you look at the world with knowledge, you realize that things are unchangeable and at the same time are constantly being transformed." -- Yukio Mishima
